summary: As part of its goal to deliver weapon systems to the battlefield at a faster pace, the Department of Defense plans to modernize its approach to testing new systems. Plans include broader use of digital engineering tools and a highly skilled workforce. Leading companies get complex systems to market quickly using iterative testing processes. We compared these companies' practices to DOD testing policies. We found...
title: Weapon Systems Testing: DOD Needs to Update Policies to Better Support Modernization Efforts
